column2:
"...eh? You're really going?
Oh, well, I made the request, but
you won't be able to defeat it!"

"But I guess someone's got to try, huh?
Otherwise, there's gonna be nothing but
trouble for other members passing through there."

"Dude, you really are one of the good ones.
Probably too good, but I guess that's
why everyone believes in you."

"All I can do is root for you, so that'll have
to do. Now go get 'em, tiger!"
